title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
**Product Title:** Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat

**Product Description:**

Elevate your yoga, Pilates, and floor exercise routine with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Made from high-quality NBR foam, this mat provides a soft and cushioned surface for optimal comfort and support. Its extra-thick design (2/5 inch) ensures superior grip and shock absorption, allowing you to focus on your practice without worrying about slipping or discomfort.

**Key Features:**

- Extra-thick (2/5 inch) for added cushioning and support
- Soft and comfortable surface for optimal grip and traction
- Includes a convenient carrier strap for easy transport and storage
- Suitable for yoga, Pilates, and various floor exercises
- Dimensions: 72 inches (length) x 24 inches (width)
- Weight: 3.11 pounds
- Color: Teal

**Product Details:**

- Material: NBR foam
- Weight capacity: Not specified (intended for individual use)
- Care instructions: Clean with a damp cloth and mild soap; avoid machine washing

**What's Included:**

- 1 x Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat
- 1 x Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap

**Order Now and Experience the Comfort and Support of a High-Quality Yoga Mat!**
